results.name: Index at which A137823(n) occurs first in A137822 (gaps in numbers m such that 3 | sum( Catalan(k), k=1..2m)).
comment: Other characterization of the sequence: concatenate pattern (1,3,2) multiplying it by 4 after each concatenation step. Or: Start with 1,3,2, then iteratively append the whole sequence obtained so far multiplied by 4^(length of the sequence divided by 3)
See A137822 and A137823 for more comments and formulas.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,4).
